tool_description: Recommends appropriate imaging protocols and settings based on patient diagnosis, anatomical area, and specific clinical requirements.

diagnosis.description: Working diagnosis or clinical indication for imaging

anatomical_area.description: Body region or organ system to be imaged

patient_species.description: Animal species (dog, cat, bird, reptile, exotic)

imaging_modality.description: Type of imaging equipment to be used

contrast_indicated.description: Whether contrast enhancement is clinically indicated

error_messages: Invalid patient species: Use one of [dog, cat, bird, reptile, exotic].
Invalid weight: Patient weight must be between 0.1 and 150 kilograms.
Incompatible modality: The specified imaging modality is not suitable for the anatomical area.
Missing diagnosis: A working diagnosis or clinical indication is required.
Invalid anatomical area: Anatomical area must be specified for protocol selection.
Protocol not found: No suitable protocol exists for the given combination of parameters.
usage: Provide diagnosis, anatomical_area, patient_species, patient_weight_kg, and imaging_modality to receive recommended imaging protocols and settings.

recommended_protocol.description: Name of the recommended imaging protocol

technical_parameters.description: Technical settings and parameters for the imaging procedure

estimated_duration.description: Estimated duration of the imaging procedure in minutes
